TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CipherAlgorithm extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A type that is used to specify a Symmetric-key algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm AES = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with 128 bits key size. Originally published as Rijndael.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm AES192 = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with 192 bits key size. Originally published as Rijndael.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm AES256 = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) with 256 bits key size. Originally published as Rijndael.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm BLOWFISH = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The Blowfish algorithm with 128 bits key size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm CAMELLIA128 = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The Camellia algorithm with 128 bits key size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm CAMELLIA256 = int32(12)

Docs.summary: The Camellia algorithm with 256 bits key size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm CAST5 = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The CAST5 (CAST-128) algorithm with 128 bits key size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm DUMMY = int32(110)
.field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm IDEA = int32(1)

Docs.summary:
The International Data Encryption Algorithm (IDEA) with 128 bits key size.
DO NOT USE. The cipher is patented in a number of countries and will expire in 2010â€“2011. You need a separate plugin in order to use IDEA together with GnuPG.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm TRIPLEDES = int32(2)

Docs.summary:
The Triple Data Encryption Algorithm (3DES or Triple DES) with 168 bits key size.
Due to the meet-in-the-middle attack the effective security it provides is only 112 bits.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Libgpgme.CipherAlgorithm TWOFISH = int32(10)

Docs.summary: The Twofish algorithm with 256 bits key size.
